(When I said that your instructor couldn't hurt you, or at least not 
hurt your hands, you will need your hands intact to type with.  The 
rest of your body can be beat up all you want, but not the hands.)

DarkMouse::
She nodded to Killfest. "Is there is nothing else, I'll take my post 
on the bridge."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Martial arts joke?
> 
> ::Killfest/EndBringer::
> 
> Killfest looks over at DrillBit as the bot enters. "Good. 
> Blacknightmare here is also teaming up with us. Are your troops 
ready 
> to expell Megatron from the base?"
> 
> With a silent order from Killfest, EndBringer walks out of the 
room, 
> also heading for the bridge.
>
